long_description: Embrace the sun and make a style statement in the bold, youthful Smith Lowdown sunglasses. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are twenty times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Matte white frames sport red Sol-X Mirror lenses; Impossibly Black frames come with Blackout lenses; Crystal frames have Green Sol-X Mirror lenses. All lenses feature a gray tint, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: Embrace the sun and make a style statement in the bold, youthful Smith Lowdown sunglasses.
